alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Gillespie; Llano; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:07AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Williamson, northeastern Gillespie, Llano and Burnet Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 106 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Evant to 9 miles west of Lampasas to near Field Creek. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burnet, Marble Falls, Kingsland, Llano, Bertram, Buchanan Dam, Gainesville, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Buchanan Lake Village, Highland Haven, Field Creek, Inks Lake State Park, Watson, Bluffton, Lake Victor, Baby Head, Stolz, Joppa and Oxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
